post.author: kgibson
post.body:
Threewave Software is hiring!

Situated in Vancouver, BC, Canada, Threewave Software is the premier video game development studio focused on providing top-notch multiplayer content to the demanding First-Person Shooter (FPS) genre. We recently finished the multiplayer maps on Disney’s Turok and are currently working on the multiplayer component for Activision’s new Wolfenstein game, as well as several undisclosed projects. Threewave has also previously worked on most of the best-selling franchises and brands in the FPS genre including id’s Quake, Epic’s Unreal, Lucas Arts’ Star Wars: Jedi Knight – Jedi Academy and Activision’s Return to Castle Wolfenstein, to name a few. Threewave Software is the game developer that top publishers go to when looking to create the most compelling multiplayer FPS experiences for gamers who demand nothing but the best.

Available Positions:

Senior Game Designer
Lead Game Designer
Level Designer
Lighting and FX Artist
Senior Programmer

Visit http://www.threewavesoftware.com for more information.

Please apply to the attention of Kathy Gibson, Director of Human Resources, via jobs@threewavesoftware.com. Please reference the position you are applying for in the subject line of your e-mail. Special thanks to all applicants for their interest.
